Delegation of DPRK State Bureau on Archives Leaves for Malaysia 
   Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK State Bureau on Archives led by Director Jon Song Guk left here on Thursday for Malaysia to participate in the 16th International Conference of Archives.
